description:
Edyst is a Y Combinator-funded company (W19) working in the online learning & employability space. Weâre looking to collaborate with people who want to significantly change the current learning and employability system in India.

In a span of 2 years, we have hit some pretty impressive figures that some of the most established names havenât:

- Our course completion rates are more than 80% (8x the industry average)
- Students spend an average of 95 minutes daily on the platform (5x the industry average)
- 50% placement ratio (2x the industry average)

We need more mavericks for this journey: people who love challenges & puzzles; people who love to learn & grow; people who want to significantly change the current learning and employability system.

founders.name: Srinivas Sriramdas, Founder
founders.description:
CEO and Co-founder of Edyst (Y Combinator Company W19 Batch), an Online learning & employability startup based in Hyderabad, India.

Over 20 years of experience in Marketing, Business Development, Key Account Mgt., Project Management, Strategy, Marketing Research, Operations, and People Management (India and overseas). Last corporate role was with Deloitte as the Head of 'Marketing Communications & Business Development' for Deloitte Australia/India.

founders.name: Aneeq Dholakia, Founder/Head of Product and Content

markdown:
raw_markdown='![](https://edyst.com/public/images/edyst.png?_wwcv=4)
Dear valued users of Edyst,We regret to inform you that Edyst has been discontinued. It has been a pleasure to serve the educational needs of our users on Edyst. Over the years, we have had the privilege of helping more than 180,000 students enhance their skills and knowledge through our platform. We are proud to have played a small role in the success of our users, and it has been an honor to be a part of their learning journey.We are particularly proud of the fact that more than 40,000 students have been able to secure jobs using the skills and knowledge they acquired on Edyst. It is a testament to the effectiveness of our platform and the dedication of our team. We are grateful for the trust that our users have placed in us, and we are honored to have been a part of their success.If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at team@edyst.comThank you again for being a part of our Edyst community.Best,Team Edyst

generated_description:
**Edyst: A Bold Venture in Online Learning and Employability**

Founded in 2019, Edyst emerged as a Y Combinator-backed startup from the Winter 2019 batch. Based in Hyderabad, India, it carved out a niche in the online learning landscape, aiming to transform the educational and employability frameworks prevalent in the country.

**Mission and Vision**  
At its core, Edyst was all about peer-to-peer learning, providing a platform where students could enhance their skills in a collaborative environment. The mission was clear: to shake up the conventional approaches to learning and job readiness, particularly in a rapidly evolving market.

**Impressive Metrics**  
In just two years, Edyst achieved some remarkable statistics that many established players in the industry would envy: 
- A staggering **80% course completion rate**, which is eight times the industry average.
- On average, students engaged with the platform for **95 minutes daily**, five times more than typical usage metrics.
- A **50% placement ratio**, an impressive feat that is double the norm for online learning platforms.

These numbers highlight not only the effectiveness of their content but also the commitment of their learners—an ecosystem fostered by dedicated mentorship and a vibrant community.

**Team and Partnerships**  
Despite its relatively small size, with a team of just 11 employees, Edyst thrived on a culture of innovation and problem-solving. They sought out mavericks—individuals passionate about challenging the status quo and eager to make a lasting impact.

**End of an Era**  
Unfortunately, Edyst has announced its discontinuation. Over its operational period, it helped over **180,000 students** enhance their skills, with **40,000** securing jobs thanks to the training and opportunities it provided. The platform was more than just a learning tool; it became a crucial stepping stone for many in their career journeys.

As we reflect on Edyst, it’s a reminder of the power of technology to reshape education and employment. Though it has closed its doors, the impact it made will resonate with the thousands who benefited from its resources. For any questions, former users can still reach out at team@edyst.com.

For more details, you could have visited their website at [edyst.com](https://edyst.com), but remember—it’s no longer operational. 

In the end, the story of Edyst is one of ambition, community, and the pursuit of educational excellence, with lessons that extend beyond the platform itself.
